snippet.title: EARL'S DAY OFF (Demo) | N64-Inspired Fishing Horror Jam Entry
snippet.description:
PLAY THE DEMO FOR FREE HERE: https://airdorf.itch.io/earls-day-off

EARL'S DAY OFF (demo) is a retro-inspired 3D fishing horror game inspired by arcade bass fishing games from the 90s and Airdorf Games' official entry for the Fishing Horror Jam presented by Horror You Haven't Played.

EARL'S DAY OFF is being developed in collaboration with Torple Dook: https://twitter.com/TorpleDook
Fishing Horror Jam: https://itch.io/jam/fish-horror-jam-2020

This trailer reflects a GAME JAM DEMO that was developed over the course of less than a month. There is MUCH MORE to come so please be patient if the game seems buggy or unfinished at the moment!

PLAY MY OTHER GAMES:
FAITH https://airdorf.itch.io/faith
FAITH: Chapter II https://airdorf.itch.io/faith2
THE WIND: https://airdorf.itch.io/thewind
EXTRA ORDINARY: https://airdorf.itch.io/extra-ordinary

Bug me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Airdorf
Buy MORTIS swag: https://society6.com/airdorf
